Author: CongratulatoryBlob
Text: He definitely knows and I’ve told him about 95% of my past with anorexia. Like most men he is not educated on mental illness, especially eating disorders. I don’t fault him for that at all, but sometimes it’s annoying.   My husband thinks I look perfect at my current weight so anything less than that he says “ew I can see visible chest/collar bones. You were too tiny...”. Ect.  I don’t know if he’s just being nice because I’m married to him or what but it still hurts feel down...

Author: throwawaygyno826378
Text: Does he know you have an eating disorder? If so then sounds like it’s an insensitive comment   If he didn’t know, it’s STILL an insensitive comment   He’s your husband, your partner, talk to him and let him know that his comment hurt you, talk to him about
